params.creditAmount: The amount of carbon credits to exchange.

exchangeEnabled().details: Returns whether the exchange is currently enabled.

protocolFeePercentage().details: Returns the current protocol fee percentage.

rewardDistributorPercentage().details: Returns the percentage of protocol fees going to the reward distributor.

setExchangeEnabled(bool).details: Enables or disables the exchange functionality.

params.enabled: Whether to enable or disable the exchange.

totalCreditsExchanged().details: Returns various statistics about the exchange.

usdcToken().details: Returns the USDC token contract address.
